attributes.action: Apologise to China for the dispicable way extremeist protestors hijacked the running of the flame through London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Politics and sport should never come together.  These people should face the harshist penalties possible, they certainly assaulted the flame holders and are a disgrace to their countries which ever they came from.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
